name: 26s

items.name: Winter's Heart
changes: Knight spec - Grants Frozen Break to Excalibur (F) → Breaks shields when hit by Excalibur (F)

items.name: Guardian Ring / True Guardian Ring / Ispion, the Runed Ring
changes: Knight spec - Removed Seal of Mana (T) duration increase

monsters.name: Death Fiend
changes: Now resets when all heroes in fight die
Wave stuns for 3 seconds → slows target down for 3 seconds

monsters.name: Valtora
changes: Tornadoes now slow down fora  bit after bouncing / slightly increased their radius

heroes.name: Berserker
changes: Provides silence immunity when toggled ON

heroes.name: Knight
changes: Redirects damage from allies onto Knight for 6 seconds → Provides (max MP X damage reduction) shield to allies for 3 seconds
Provides (30 + damage reduction / 2)% shield to allies → shares damage reduction and HP recovery with allies

heroes.name: Hermit
changes: HP restoration is applied to lowest ally → closest ally

heroes.name: Water Mage
changes: Skill damage increase still applies when shield is depleted

misc: -title command removed

name: 26p
bugs: Powder box - Fixed having 2 of each powder on hero selection load (for real this time)

name: 26m
bugs: Powder box - fixed having 2 of each powder on hero selection/load

name: 26k
bugs: Fixed a bug that prevented the Ice Shard quest to be turned in
Ifrit - Fixed Seeds of Flame getting removed by greater debuff cleanse

items.name: Benedict, the Crimson Armor of Blood
changes: When max HP is accumulated: HP recovery per second → HP Regen

items.name: Eye of the Abyss / Void Eye / Eye of the Flame Lord
changes: Changed to also apply skill damage aura to summons

monsters.name: Monster notes
changes: Difficulty scaling restricted to the bosses named below:

monsters.name: Tentacle Lord
changes: Horn of Deep Sea / Infested Tentacle droprate: 3% → 5%

monsters.name: Giant Golem
changes: Corrupted Crystal Fragment / Corrupt Creations droprate: 3% → 5%

heroes.name: Phantom Blade
changes: Adds full HP regen effect of Soul (D) for duration

heroes.name: Arcane Mage
changes: Healing Turtles in Turtle Lord fight are now considered as bosses by this spell

misc: Increased speed of corpses dissapearing
Changed powder box to fill up when hero is selected/loaded
Bags
Base inventory size: 23 → 24
Token's (except some) inventory size: 24 → 30
Base movement speed: 350 → 250
Token's (except some) movement speed: 450 → 500
Bags are now able to drop items with Patrol (p) (cannot pickup same way)

name: 26h
bugs: Movespeed - Fixed related bugs
Dashes - Fixed bugs related to spells like Paladin Holy Divide (Q) / Thunderers Lightning Rush (W)
Lancer - Fixed Oriental Spear Mastery (D) buff not applying when re-casted
Martial Artist - Fixed being unable to drop Grandine, the Plates of Wraith after using Nameless Arts (F) with Sacred Heart from Heaven's Fist active
Shooter - Fixed Distortion (R) causing various damage resistance-related bugs

items.name: Frostbane
changes: Consecutive Freezing Shot (W) damage: 10000 + 80 X AGI → 400% attack damage + 80 X AGI

items.name: Everfrostbane
changes: Consecutive Freezing Shot (W) damage: 10000 + 112 ~ 128 X AGI → 400% attack damage + 112 ~ 128 X AGI

items.name: Winter Robe
changes: Removed 2% extra skill damage increase from Water Mage Spec

items.name: Wanderer's Cape
changes: Martial Artist spec: Reduces Nameless Arts (F) cast time by 0.5 seconds → Reduces cast time by 1 second

items.name: Wings of Phoenix
changes: Removed 1 second duration increase for Martial Artist spec

monsters.name: Valtora
changes: HP threshold to be able to cast Judgment of Skies: 85% → 50%

monsters.name: Death Fiend
changes: Empower attacks now deal damage to secondary targets based on their armor

heroes.name: Dark Knight
changes: Duration: 3 seconds → 2.5 seconds (total damage output is same)

heroes.name: Crusader
changes: Final slash damage: 475 X STR → 550 X STR

heroes.name: Paladin
changes: Removed 75 movespeed increase if at least on spirit exists

heroes.name: Berserker
changes: No longer decreases duration of Berserk (T) while active

heroes.name: Shooter
changes: Debuff no longer is removed when knockback is activated

heroes.name: Bow Master
changes: No longer increases damage if casted after Flame Shot (Q)

heroes.name: Alchemist
changes: Bonus damage if casted on targets affected by Conjure Air (E) - Rock Storm (R): 1.75 ~ 2.75 → 2 ~ 2.5

misc: Fixed Orb of the Deep Sea description being outdated
Decreased visual Noise of Lightning Mage's Lightning bolt (Q) with casual costume enabled

name: 26f
bugs: Movement - Fixed units sometimes getting stuck on border between areas
Berserker - Fixed Blade Rush (R) not consuming HP on use
Paladin - Fixed Holy Divide (Q) sometimes not moving towards target point on use

heroes.name: Shooter
changes: Damage: main stat X 60 → main stat X 50
Debuff no longer shared between other shooters
Damage per projectile: 120% attack damage + 8 X main stat → 100% attack damage + 7.5 X main stat

misc: Reduced map size (preventing map download bugs)

name: 26e
bugs: Jack - Powder bug fix
Lancer - Speed bug fix
Fixed Shooter's Water Bullet (Q) with Hydrobuster not working

items.name: Ring of Time
changes: Recipe: Spirit of Abyss → Spirit of Abyss / Orb of Oblivion

monsters.name: Death Fiend
changes: Mark of Death duration: 15 seconds → 30 seconds

name: 26d
bugs: Map - Fixed bugs related to downloading map in-game
Lancer - Changed Pierce (Q) to not get stuck inside enemies
Wings of Death - Fixed being able to move over terrain
Death Fiend - Fixed not healing summons sometimes
Bag of Mother Nature - Fixed merchange spec not increasing duration of Life Shield Scroll (E)

items.name: Item notes
changes: Removed movespeed increase from all items
Dean Jaina can dissassemble some items with W option (limited to dropabble items)
1 Proof of Endeavor is created when disassembling Rectus / Spirit Beast / Flame Nightmare / Turtle Lord items
6 Proof of Endeavor can be used to forge material from said bosses

items.name: Hellspike Armor
changes: Changed charge percentage text to last longer

items.name: Silky Bag / Very Silky Bag / Fruit-filled Bag / Candy-filled Bag / Candy-Filled Bag +1
Bag of Heaven / Bag of Life / Bag of Mother Nature

monsters.name: Monster notes
changes: Changed powder costs for following bosses
Count: 2 White and 2 Red → 2 White and 1 Red
Frostspider Lord: 4 Blue and 2 Holy → 4 Blue and 1 Holy
Turtle Lord: 6 Blue and 6 Green → 4 Blue and 4 Green
All bosses that cost 3 mana → now costs 2 mana
Added difficulty scaling based on amount of players
7 players: 10% damage resistance and 5% droprate increase
8 players: 20% damage resistance and 10% droprate increase
9 players: 30% damage resistance and 15% droprate increase
10 players: 40% damage resistance and 20% droprate increase
Removed difficulty scaling from Skeleton King Desperia, Archangel Samael, and Shadow Dragon Irbert

monsters.name: Death Knight / Ragnaar / Tentacle Lord / Giant Golem / Mana Ancient
Mad Clown
changes: Changed to be a Raid Boss (no longer respawns, can be revived from memory stone for 2 mana)

monsters.name: Valtora
changes: Tornadoes now move more randomly, and get stuck less

heroes.name: Hero notes
changes: Changed base movespeed of all heroes to 500
Cooldown of summons recall spell: 10 seconds → 1 second
Removed movespeed increase from spells that can't increase it past 500
Example: Priest Holy Aurora (E) 30% movespeed increase removed
Example: Martial Artist Footwalk (D) / Reapers Scythe Mastery (D) 125 / 100 move speed kept
Example: Sword Enchanter's Speed Enchant (W) 400 movespeed kept

heroes.name: Berserker
changes: Changed units affected by proc to appear red to Berserker
Draining 30% max HP per second → draining 30% current HP per second
First strike and per second damage: 400% attack damage + 40 X STR → 500% attack damage + 50 X STR
Now able to move and cast other spells for duration
Bonus damage to bleeding targets: (75 + skill damage)% → 100% and a chance to reset bleed duration

heroes.name: Swordsman
changes: Additional damage: 17.5 X AGI → 25 X AGI
Additonal damage: 9 X AGI → 10 X AGI

heroes.name: Phantom Blade
changes: Changed attack range to 500 (to avoid right click bugs)
Changed to hit boss units first if multiple enemies are hit

heroes.name: Wind Mage
changes: Changed to not move camera to target point

heroes.name: Arcane Mage
changes: Changed to target nearby boss units first if multiple enemies are nearby
Damage per projectile: 30 X INT → 40 X INT

misc: Slightly adjusted early game leveling
Slightly increased base stats
Everyone who has a character, please retrieve them using Mage Tower option for it
Added tombstone of your player color to appear on death
Changed bags to absorb ores too with Absorb Magic Stone spell
Changed bags to drop Yeti Tooth as well with Drop Magic Stone spell

name: 26b
bugs: Fixed a bug where the game kept crashing while fighting Death Fiend
Warlock - Fixed a bug that made the screen keep shaking even after end channeling of Soul Grimoire (R)

name: 26a
bugs: Blue Lotus Aura - Fixed not replacing some ring visuals

items.name: Atricia, the Sword of Dreams
changes: Fragment of Chaos in recipe changed to be interchangeable with Spearhead of Death
Fragment of Chaos might get removed from recipe later on

items.name: Twin Snow
changes: Elementalist Spec Added: Seal of Water (W) HP increased by 20%

items.name: Triple Snow
changes: Elementalist Spec Added: Seal of Water (W) HP increased by 40%

items.name: Bloodsoul Plates
changes: Fragment of Oblivion no longer interchangeable with Orb of Oblivion
Burning Bone Fragments now interchangeable with Dragonic Orb
Burning Bone Fragments might get removed from recipe later on

items.name: Druid's Mantle
changes: Fairies are only generated while in combat → will always be generated

items.name: Cold Ring of Death
changes: Swordsman Spec: Increases Quick Draw (D) damage by 15% removed

items.name: Walrus
changes: Double right-click to ram allies → use Move (M) to ram allies

monsters.name: Anceint Ent
changes: Purified Water of Nature / Fragment of the Wind droprate: 0.02% → 0.04%

monsters.name: Death Fiend
changes: Revival timers for all monsters in Abandoned Cemetery stops while Death Fiend is alive
Added red visual effect to monster's arms when casting claws
Added green visual effect to monster's arms when casting waves
Soul swallow cast time: 1.5 seconds → 2 seconds

monsters.name: Valtora
changes: Red lines now disappear when Valtora dies

monsters.name: Ifrit
changes: Stun duration after charge: 5 seconds → 1.5 seconds
No longer releases waves on death once Ifrit is killed or reset

heroes.name: Swordsman
changes: Final slash damage buffed from 300 X AGI → 400 X AGI

heroes.name: Phantom Blade
changes: Increases HP regen by 2% per 4 souls → increases HP regen by 0.5% per soul

heroes.name: Bow Master
changes: Base damage per arrow: 150% attack damage → 100% attack damage (Heartseeker: 1200% attack damage → 800% attack damage)

heroes.name: Warlock
changes: Attack speed increase of Dimension Collapse (W) orbs: 400% → 500%
No longer ends channeling if you run out of MP during Demonic Fury (T)
No longer exits transformed form if Soul Grimoire (R) is channeling
Removed additional 10% skill damage increase after 15 seconds of duration
Added new spell when active - Soul Offering (T): Reduces empower cycle 1 second to 0.25 seconds

heroes.name: Elementalist
changes: Refreshing Well now also affects itself

misc: Fixed description errors for Bahanar, the Sword of Illusion / Bahanar, the True Sword of Illusion

name: 25h
misc: Added -title command temporarily
This command allows players to test how their title looks in game
It can be done by writing -title <hex code> <title>
Example: -title ff0047 Jerk
Titles will still be added manually, this command is only for testing your title choices.

changes: Changed active projectiles to ignore terrain

misc: Event
Lucky beach ball
Changed seals to be invincible
Changed seals to be stun-immune

name: 25e

Reworked lucky beach ball
Changed to ignore terrain and objects again
When ball spawns, each player gets a seal that can move through terrian and teleport with (Q); Slippers removed
Beach balls no longer collide with heroes. Can only collide with seals

bugs: Gunner - Fixed not being able to craft summer costume
Blue Lotus Aura - Fixed not replacing some ring effects

monsters.name: Ancient Ent
changes: Changed to be revivable after Ancient Ent and all Elder Ents are dead

misc: Event
Added ticket/ball drop chance to more bosses
Item bosses
Death Knight, Ragnaar, Giant Golem, Tentacle Lord, Mana Ancient, Mad Clown

Rudolph - Fixed not showing properly

monsters.name: Ancient Ent
changes: No longer revivable if Elder Ent still alive

Seasea ticket droprate increased by 50%
Event item droprate from seasea red/green pouches decreased by 33%

Death Fiend, Valtora, Ifrit, Skeleton King, Zombie Lord, Ancient Ent, Samael, Shadow Dragon, Frostspider Lord, Demon Lord Beriel, Corruptor Rectus, Flame Nightmare, Turtle Lord, Hydra, Count, Jack, Wings of Death, Mage Lord, Spirit Beast, Bone Dragon, Guardian Angels (no ball), Corrupt Angel (No ball)

Shining Seashells - Droprate decrease after obtaining 10 reduced

changes: On attack damage: main stat X 0.75 → main stat X 1
